legge1899.quote: the dragon lies hid in the deep; it is not the time for active doing

line_companion.quote: Time is everything. You have to wait for it.

01.1.why_cited: HD favors waiting and self-timed creation; IC names hidden dragon and no action, emphasizing restrained potential.

legge1899.quote: the dragon lies hid in the deep; it is not the time for active doing

line_companion.quote: Time is everything. You have to wait for it.

01.1.why_cited: Healthy behavior honors sacred timing and initiation; IC's hidden dragon signals pause before ritual emergence.

legge1899.quote: the dragon appearing in the field; it will be advantageous to see the great man

line_companion.quote: When you are called out, you must respond.

01.2.why_cited: Emergence + meeting the great one = initiation/ordeal pattern (Orion Light quick_rule).

legge1899.quote: the dragon appearing in the field; it will be advantageous to see the great man

line_companion.quote: When you are called out, you must respond.

01.2.why_cited: Seeks initiation through contact with a worthy teacher; IC favors audience with the great person.

legge1899.quote: all the day long the superior man is creatively active; at nightfall his mind is still beset with cares

line_companion.quote: You work and work and work.

01.3.why_cited: Drives creation through sustained effort; IC emphasizes ceaseless activity and vigilance amid difficulty.

legge1899.quote: all the day long the superior man is creatively active; at nightfall his mind is still beset with cares

line_companion.quote: You work and work and work.

01.3.why_cited: Builds structure to handle load; IC warns of danger during nonstop striving, inviting disciplined management.

legge1899.quote: wavering flight over the depths; there will be no error

line_companion.quote: This is a time of testing and transition.

01.4.why_cited: Accepts initiation across an abyss; IC shows perilous flight with counsel yielding no blame.

legge1899.quote: wavering flight over the depths; there will be no error

line_companion.quote: This is a time of testing and transition.

01.4.why_cited: Moves into uncertainty and adapts mid-flight; IC depicts risky passage without fault.

legge1899.quote: the dragon is on the wing in the sky; it will be advantageous to see the great man

line_companion.quote: You have earned the right to lead.

01.5.why_cited: Creative mastery ascends; IC's flying dragon in heaven signals recognized leadership.

legge1899.quote: the dragon is on the wing in the sky; it will be advantageous to see the great man

line_companion.quote: You have earned the right to lead.

01.5.why_cited: Initiated creator now radiates; IC associates ascent with the great person and broad benefit.

legge1899.quote: the dragon exceeds the proper limits; there will be occasion for repentance

01.6.why_cited: Overreach and control-seeking mark distortion; IC warns of arrogant dragon and regret.

legge1899.quote: the dragon exceeds the proper limits; there will be occasion for repentance

01.6.why_cited: Status-hoarding and dominance reflect shadow; IC's excess brings downfall and correction.
